metadata.title: CVE-2014-0123 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The wiki subsystem in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.9, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 does not properly restrict (1) viewand (2) edit access, which allows remote authenticated users to performwiki operations by leveraging the student role and using the RecentActivity block to reach the individual wiki of an arbitrary student.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
